summary.span: 命名空間包含用戶端服務提供者及其他類別，可支援在 Windows 架構應用程式中存取 Microsoft Ajax 驗證、角色和設定檔服務。

span.span: The namespace contains client service providers and other classes that support access in Windows-based applications to the Microsoft Ajax authentication, roles, and profile services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的類別命名空間包含用戶端應用程式服務提供者可讓以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式使用[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]驗證、 角色和設定檔服務。The classes in the namespace include client application service providers that enable Windows-based applications to use the [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services. 您可以啟用這些服務和應用程式組態檔中，指定用戶端服務提供者並再存取服務，透過現有[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]成員資格、 識別和應用程式設定基礎結構。You can enable these services and specify client service providers in your application configuration file, and then access the services through existing [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] membership, identity, and application settings infrastructures. 用戶端服務提供者也支援偶爾連接的儲存和擷取應用程式離線時的本機資料快取中的使用者資訊。The client service providers also support occasional connectivity by storing and retrieving user information in a local data cache when the application is offline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md). 若要存取登入服務，您可以使用 Windows 或表單驗證，藉由指定或應用程式組態中。To access the login service, you can use either Windows or Forms authentication by specifying the or in your application configuration. Windows 驗證會使用使用者登入的作業系統時所提供的身分識別。Windows authentication uses the identity supplied when a user logs in to the operating system. 表單驗證會要求您擷取使用者的登入資訊，並將它傳遞至服務。Forms authentication requires that you to retrieve login information from the user and pass it to the service. 您可以藉由指定實作您組態。You can do this by specifying an implementation with your configuration. 方法會傳回物件，其中包含使用者登入資訊。The method returns a object that contains user login information. 您可以藉由顯示登入 對話方塊中的，比方說，填入這個物件方法。You can populate this object, for example, by displaying a login dialog box in the method. 若要存取的角色和設定檔服務，請指定和應用程式組態中。To access the roles and profile services, specify the and in your application configuration.
